entry.title: Tuesday night: Showers. Low plus 4.
entry.summary: Showers. Risk of a thundershower late this evening and after midnight. Fog patches developing near midnight. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this evening. Low plus 4. Forecast issued 8:35 PM ADT Tuesday 18 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of showers. High 13. POP 60%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 60 percent chance of showers in the afternoon. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h in the afternoon. High 13. UV index 7 or high. Forecast issued 8:35 PM ADT Tuesday 18 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of showers. Low plus 1. POP 60%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 60 percent chance of showers in the evening. Clearing before morning. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light in the evening. Low plus 1. Forecast issued 8:35 PM ADT Tuesday 18 April 2023
